reference.title: cxxEnumeration module
reference.shortdesc: Defines a top-level container for all the elements necessary to describe an C++ API enumeration.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxEnumeration> topic type contains elements necessary to show the name of the enumeration, the enumeration syntax, and the enumeration use description. This topic type module also contains all the elements necessary to describe the component variables and functions.
The cxxEnumeration topic contains the following elements:
